Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2009 03:50PM - edited Jan 15, 2009 08:12PM by byzalot Hi All, I had a lumpectomy with SNB on Nov 18, no clear margins and they found another tumor of a  different cell type, 2nd lumpectomy on Dec 9, still no clear margins, 3rd and final lumpectomy on Dec 30 with clear margins.  As far as going back to work, I was back to work within 2 days of each lumpectomy. I am a nail technician so I use my arms quite a bit. I was a little uncomfortable, but nothing that motrin didn't take care of. I think each person is different as far as recovery.  My surgeon kept using the same incision for each subsequent excision, so I have a 3 inch incision under the nipple.My SNB incision is about 2 inches. I was highly motivated to keep my breast so I kept choosing for lumpectomies. I am happy I made that decision. My Oncotype came back 18, that darn grey area, I am choosing rads followed by hormonal therapy.
